Sentencas: Reversible symmetrical solid oxide cell (RSSOC) exhibits considerable potential for direct power to X and X to power at low cost and enhanced reliability.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: The electrode with promising electrocatalytic activity is vital to promote its overall performance.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: Thus, this work explores the La0.6Ca0.4Fe0.8Co0.2O3-delta (LCFC) perovskite oxide for RSSOC.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: The results demonstrate that the LCFC exhibits promising conductivity (203 Scm(-1)) and thermal expansion coefficient (14.3 x 10(-6) K-1) as the air electrode.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: Moreover, the reduced LCFC (fuel electrode) with in situ exsolved Co-Fe alloy nanoparticles exhibits excellent CO2 adsorption ability and sufficient oxygen vacancies.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: The performance of the LCFC electrode can be significantly enhanced with the good compatibility air electrode and highly active fuel electrode.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: The cell in the SOFC mode demonstrates outstanding peak power densities of 0.962 and 0.673 Wcm(-2) operated with H-2 and CO at 800 degrees C, respectively, while in the SOEC mode, the current densities of 1.631 and 1.574 Acm(-2) can be obtained at 1.5 V with 50% H2O-50% H-2 and pure CO2, respectively.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: The cell also exhibits excellent short-term stability in both the SOFC and SOEC modes.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes

Sentencas: All of the results confirm the feasibility of the LCFC material used for the implementation of RSSOC.
Titulo: Clean and Sustainable Power to X to Power by Reversible Symmetrical Solid Oxide Cells with Highly Active Ferrite Perovskite Electrodes
